Exhaust Services.name: Catalytic Converter Repair/Replacement
Exhaust Services.description: Exhaust services where residual catalytic converter parts remain encased in the crankshaft casting, or slightly damaged by improperly cleaned crankcase or reaction wheel surfaces.

Exhaust Services.name: Exhaust Repair/Replacement
Exhaust Services.description: Repair or replace broken or misshapen exhaust system parts, including: fins, emitters, gaskets, cylinders, exhaust pipes, etc.

Exhaust Services.name: Exhaust Manifold Repair/Replacement
Exhaust Services.description: Repair or replace broken or mangled exhaust system manifolds by clipping and/or replacing seam gas suppressors.

Exhaust Services.name: Muffler Repair/Replacement
Exhaust Services.description: Repair or replace other damaged or misfunctional muffler parts.

Exhaust Services.name: Tailpipe Repair/Replacement
Exhaust Services.description: Repair or replace other damaged or misfunctional tailpipe parts.

Heating & Air Conditioner Repair.name: AC Belt Replacement
Heating & Air Conditioner Repair.description: Replacing or repairing AC belts to improve their life.

Heating & Air Conditioner Repair.name: Compressor Repair/Replacement
Heating & Air Conditioner Repair.description: Replacing or repairing modified, overused or misused or missing gas (O2) compressors.

Heating & Air Conditioner Repair.name: Evaporator Repair/Replacement
Heating & Air Conditioner Repair.description: Replacing or repairing evaporators and evaporator bags.

Heating & Air Conditioner Repair.name: Heating & Cooling System Diagnostics
Heating & Air Conditioner Repair.description: Diagnosing or identifying hot and cold evaporator unit issues such as: flue lag, underheating, nozzles, crimping, leaking or cleaning.

Heating & Air Conditioner Repair.name: Cooling System Repair
Heating & Air Conditioner Repair.description: Repairing parts of the cooling system that aren't running highly redundant air/coolant systems, or other, common issues.

Heating & Air Conditioner Repair.name: Heating System Repair/Replacement
Heating & Air Conditioner Repair.description: Repairing a broken or malfunctioning heat exchanger, vector drive, or vector freon converter, or flat-out missing a boost system.

Heating & Air Conditioner Repair.name: Refrigerant Replacement
Heating & Air Conditioner Repair.description: Replacing or repairing refrigerant on air/coolant systems and/or ignition fuel.

Electrical Services.name: Electrical System Diagnostics & Repair
Electrical Services.description: Diagnosing or identifying common electrical problems such as fuse blown and distortion in ratings or over voltage/under voltage.

Electrical Services.name: Check Engine Light Diagnostics & Repair
Electrical Services.description: Using the check-engine light and the inspection light to test engine for smoke, oil, battery problems and other electrical problems.

Electrical Services.name: Light Repair & Bulb Replacement
Electrical Services.description: Replacing and repairing light bulbs (HOBs) used on electrical systems such as light switches and/or indicator lights.

Electrical Services.name: Power Accessory Repair
Electrical Services.description: Repairing, exchanging and/or replacing electrical connection accessories such as power cord, lead plug, battery, tensioner and/or fuses.

Electrical Services.name: Power Lock Repair
Electrical Services.description: Combining the mechanical and electrical parts of a power lock.

Electrical Services.name: Power Window Repair
Electrical Services.description: Repairing power window's electrical system components.

Electrical Services.name: Windshield Wiper Repair
Electrical Services.description: Repairing a 'bad load' windshield wiper system

Transmission Services.name: Axle Repair & Replacement
Transmission Services.description: Complete repair and replacement of axles.

Transmission Services.name: Clutch Repair & Replacement
Transmission Services.description: Complete repair and replacement of clutches.

Transmission Services.name: Differential Diagnosis
Transmission Services.description: Identifying or diagnosing problems with the differential flange.

Transmission Services.name: Differential Rebuild & Service
Transmission Services.description: Troubleshooting disc pads and rotating surfaces to analyze wear patterns and/or performance.

Transmission Services.name: Driveshaft & U-Joint Repair
Transmission Services.description: Complete driveline & driveshaft repairs and maintenance.

Transmission Services.name: Transmission Fluid Service
Transmission Services.description: Repairing, replacing and/or replacing transmission fluid and/or additives.

Transmission Services.name: Transmission Repair & Service
Transmission Services.description: Replacement and/or repair of damaged, or mis-shaped or incomplete transmission parts.

Transmission Services.name: Transmission Replacement
Transmission Services.description: Replacing or transferring defective, cracked or damaged parts of a transmission to improve performance.

Tire Services.name: Wheel Balancing
Tire Services.description: Repairing, replacing and repairing wheels to achieve more balanced operation.

Tire Services.name: Tire Installation
Tire Services.description: Attaching, inserting, or adjusting a tire in a tire-mounted vehicle or in a tire-mounted vehicle.

Tire Services.name: Tire Replacement
Tire Services.description: Replacing a tire or a complete tire set - such as a car, truck, van, or SUV.

Tire Services.name: Wheel Alignment
Tire Services.description: Aligning the wheels to meet a higher level of specification or to adjust everything on the vehicle properly and according to expectations.

Tire Services.name: Flat Tire Repair
Tire Services.description: Replacing or repairing punctured tires using plugs, patches and/or sealant.

Tire Services.name: Season Tire Change
Tire Services.description: Swapping summer/winter tires on and off of a vehicle.

Tire Services.name: Curb rash repair
Tire Services.description: Repairing a bad 'curb rash' on a wheel or rim.

Engine Services.name: Drivability Diagnostics & Repair
Engine Services.description: Repairing, exchanging and/or repairing drive shaft or drive internals such as a crankshaft, or an intermediate shaft or a differential cover.

Engine Services.name: Engine Replacement
Engine Services.description: Replacing or repairing a failed or malfunctioning engine with a more powerful or specific engine - such as diesel engine, gas engine, or an air-engine.

Engine Services.name: Engine Performance Check
Engine Services.description: Replacing or repairing parts related to the engine performance check's electrical connection or engine controller.

Engine Services.name: Fuel Injection Repair & Service
Engine Services.description: Repairing, replacing and/or replacing fuel injector systems and/or filters.

Engine Services.name: Fuel System Repair & Maintenance
Engine Services.description: Repairing, replacing and/or repairing fuel system parts such as fuel tank, fuel gauge, gas tank, gas pump, gas door and/or gas hood.

Engine Services.name: Hose Replacement
Engine Services.description: Replacing and/or repairing rubber hoses and/or vacuum lines.

Engine Services.name: Ignition System Repair & Maintenance
Engine Services.description: Complete ignition system repairs and maintenance.

Engine Services.name: Radiator Repair & Replacement
Engine Services.description: Departure or repair of radiators for maintenance.

Engine Services.name: Water Pump Repair & Replacement
Engine Services.description: Complete repair and replacement of water pumps.

Brake System.name: Brake Pad Replacement
Brake System.description: Complete repair and replacement of brake pads.

Brake System.name: Brake Calliper service
Brake System.description: Complete repair and replacement of brake callipers.

Brake System.name: Brake fluid leak
Brake System.description: Replacing or repairing brake fluid hose, drain plug and/or bolts.

Brake System.name: Disk rotor resurface
Brake System.description: Resurfacing disk rotors to improve operation.

Maintenance Services.name: Shocks & Struts Repair
Maintenance Services.description: Complete repair and replacement of shock absorbers.

Maintenance Services.name: Factory Scheduled Maintenance
Maintenance Services.description: Fully implement factory warranties or warranty extensions.

Maintenance Services.name: Filter Replacements
Maintenance Services.description: Replacing engine and/or cabin air filters.

Maintenance Services.name: 12 point Inspection
Maintenance Services.description: Performing 12-point inspections, including: visual inspections, oil checks, pressure checks, and more.

Maintenance Services.name: Oil Change
Maintenance Services.description: Draining old oil out of the engine system and replenishing it with new oil.

Maintenance Services.name: Windshield Wiper Blades
Maintenance Services.description: Replacing or repairing windshield wiper blades to improve safety.
